entry.title: mask-shakill/blog-api-elysia: A lightweight and efficient REST API for managing blog posts, built with the Elysia framework. This project demonstrates how to set up a blog backend with Elysia and includes routes for creating, reading, updating, and deleting blog entries.
entry.content: A lightweight and efficient REST API for managing blog posts, built with the Elysia framework. This project demonstrates how to set up a blog backend with Elysia and includes routes for creating, reading, updating, and deleting blog entries.

entry.title: enrickaliberti/Autocomplete.js: Autocomplete.js is a lightweight and highly customizable library for adding autocomplete functionality to input fields. Ideal for improving the usability of your web applications and providing users with a smooth and responsive experience.

entry.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A zero-race-condition fetch wrapper packed with essential features - timeouts, retries, interceptors, and much more, all while still retained a similar API surface with fetch. Power and simplicity in one lightweight package.
entry.content: A zero-race-condition fetch wrapper packed with essential features - timeouts, retries, interceptors, and much more, all while still retained a similar API surface with fetch. Power and simplicity in one lightweight package.

entry.title: fix2015/no-sleep-app: NoSleepJs is a lightweight JavaScript library that prevents devices from going to sleep during critical activities. It uses the Screen Wake Lock API or a fallback video playback method to keep the screen active, ensuring uninterrupted user experiences across modern and legacy devices.
entry.content: NoSleepJs is a lightweight JavaScript library that prevents devices from going to sleep during critical activities. It uses the Screen Wake Lock API or a fallback video playback method to keep the screen active, ensuring uninterrupted user experiences across modern and legacy devices.

entry.content: A lightweight and chainable library for easy DOM manipulation in modern browsers.

entry.title: martinmanu/theme-labs: "ThemeLab is a lightweight, configurable theming library to help you manage and apply themes in your app. Developed for easy use in any frontend framework or libraries with direct focus on development ease in setting up a fully fledged configurable themes for your application."
entry.content: "ThemeLab is a lightweight, configurable theming library to help you manage and apply themes in your app. Developed for easy use in any frontend framework or libraries with direct focus on development ease in setting up a fully fledged configurable themes for your application."
